txt.en:
'Cooks also serve a valuable purpose here. We have tricks here in the deep to focus our minds, speed our feet, and strengthen our backs when doing the heavy work needed to craft enough hard tack for an expedition.

'Ingúl Overstoke, near the ovens, tracks the needs of the workers in the space and will reward any cook who delivers upon their promises.

'We use an enhanced ale brewed in Thorin's Hall to focus the minds of anyone doing strenuous tasks. We season mushrooms with spices stored in a larder here in Ukhbab-gairu to lift up our spirits and put a spring in our step. We also fish the stream running through the depths and season them with spices, and mushrooms to make it easier to haul and carry ore and ingredients.

'Cooks are well-rewarded for their efforts here in Ukhbab-gairu.'
